headline: What is setting Plex apart from the streaming competition?
summary: Plex CEO Keith Valory discusses the streaming platform's ad-supported video on demand (AVOD) service and content catalogs. Plex also allows users to stream their own personal media libraries. Also catch Keith Valory share his thoughts on the importance of media companies maintaining and upholding their free speech rights. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
